thread.title: Trip Hop duo in town
thread.title_full: Trip Hop duo in town - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Trip Hop duo in town
text:
Arguably one of India's distinctive talents, Sulk Station has quietly been making waves across the country and has emerged as a cutting edge multi-genre musical fusion production that comprises western contemporary trip hop/ambient and Hindustani classical vocals. The duo has performed at major festivals in India and the UK. It is one of Bangalore's most prominent and talented Trip Hop duo, whose music is an innovative template of ambient sounds and rhythms with compelling tunes. Vocalist Tanvi Rao and producer Rahul Giri are creating their own brand of lush, moody and hypnotic music set in a heavenly ambience.
The concert is scheduled to take place on September 19 (9 pm) at Bflat and High Note, 100 Feet Road , HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar.
